caption: Figure S1: Ablations on diffusion feature for point tracking at test time, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right).
description: The chart displays the FID and FVD scores on DAVIS-7 dataset for different 3D-UNet decoder feature indices used for point tracking.

caption: Figure S1: Ablations on diffusion feature for point tracking at test time, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right).
description: The chart displays the FID and FVD scores on DAVIS-7 and UCF101-7 datasets for different feature indices used in point tracking within the 3D-UNet decoder.

caption: Figure S2: Ablations on the start and end diffusion steps for correspondence guidance, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right). We use a total sampling step of 30.
description: The chart shows the FID and FVD scores on DAVIS-7 dataset for different ranges of diffusion steps used for correspondence guidance during video frame interpolation.

caption: Figure S2: Ablations on the start and end diffusion steps for correspondence guidance, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right). We use a total sampling step of 30.
description: The chart displays the FID and FVD scores on DAVIS-7 and UCF101-7 datasets for different start and end diffusion steps used for correspondence guidance during video frame interpolation.

caption: Figure S3: Ablations on the number of trajectories for guidance during sampling, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right).
description: The chart displays the FID and FVD scores on DAVIS-7 dataset for different numbers of trajectories used for guidance during sampling.

caption: Figure S3: Ablations on the number of trajectories for guidance during sampling, experiments conducted on DAVIS-7 (left) and UCF101-7 (right).
description: The chart displays the impact of varying the number of trajectories used for guidance on FID and FVD scores for DAVIS-7 and UCF101-7 datasets.
